meanings.definition: A group of RNA viruses that are transmitted by arthropods and cause diseases such as dengue fever and Zika virus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study flaviviruses to understand their impact on health.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined by pesky flaviviruses buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny invaders, flaviviruses infiltrate the body through mosquito bites.
meanings.sent5: The danger of flaviviruses lurks in the shadows of tropical climates.
